claim: Flublok contains 45 micrograms (mcg) of HA per strain vs 15 mcg of HA per strain in a standard-dose influenza vaccine.

extracted_evidence.quote: Flublok is standardized according to United States Public Health Service (USPHS) requirements. For the 2024-2025 influenza season it is formulated to contain 135 mcg HA per 0.5 mL dose, with 45 mcg HA of each of the following 3 influenza virus strains
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote confirms that Flublok contains 45 mcg of HA per strain, supporting the claim about its HA content per strain.

extracted_evidence.quote: Across three clinical trials (Studies 2 – 4, Tables 2 and 3) a total of 2050 adults age 50 years and older received Flublok and 2048 received a U.S.-licensed trivalent in activated influenza vaccine (IIV3) comparator.
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote references the comparator as a 'U.S.-licensed trivalent inactivated influenza vaccine (IIV3)', which is commonly known to contain 15 mcg of HA per strain, supporting the comparison in the claim.
